import React from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; class PostTask extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = {task_type: 'in-person'}; this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this); this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); } handleChange(event) { this.setState({ [event.target.name]: event.target.value}); } async handleSubmit(event) { event.preventDefault(); const submitData = { task_type: this.state.task_type, task_title: event.target.task_title.value, task_desc: event.target.task_desc.value, task_suburb: event.target.task_suburb?.value, task_date: event.target.task_date.value, cost_type: event.target.cost_type.value, task_cost: event.target.task_cost.value, }; await axios.post(`${process.env.REACT_APP_API}/tasks`, submitData); this.formNode.reset(); } render() { return (

(this.formNode = node)}>
